name: Lenovo 06P4069 Wired Optical Mouse
Features: [Backed by renowned IBM Service and Support, It's the same mouse that is included with select ThinkCentre desktop systems, Fits comfortably in either hand, Stealth black colour complements both ThinkCentre and ThinkPad systems, No mousepad required - works on many different surfaces, No ball to get dusty, dirty or lost, Integrated wheel scrolling device, Full-sized mouse uses optical tracking technology for precision control]
